author: Ben Sixsmith
title: The Coronavirus is a War, But It’s More Willow Run Than Stalingrad
description: We need production to keep our economy afloat lest we sacrifice society in the name of public health. The post The Coronavirus is a War, But It’s More Willow Run Than Stalingrad appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: We need production to keep our economy afloat lest we sacrifice society in the name of public health.The lockdowns are unsustainable. While closing public placesschools, universities, restaurants, bars, gyms, et ceteramight have contained the spread of corona… [+5667 chars]
